title: BoJack Horseman
description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the '90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show Horsin' Around, but today he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

title: Arrested Development
description: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.

title: Game of Thrones
description: While a civil war brews between several noble families, in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, return after thousands of years in the North.
comment: Oh god when is he gonna finish that book

title: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with terminal lung cancer teams up with his former student to cook and sell crystal meth.

title: Archer
description: At International Secret Intelligence Service no one ever shuts up. Covert black ops and espionage take a back seat to zany personalities and intricate relationships between the ISIS agents and drones.
comment: I swear to god I had something for this.

title: Better Call Saul
description: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer, Saul Goodman, in the time leading up to establishing his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
comment: Some people are immune to good advice

title: Futurama
description: Fry, a pizza guy is accidentally frozen in 1999 and thawed out New Year's Eve 2999.
comment: Why'd they have to cancel that again?

title: Halt & Catch Fire
description: Set in the early 1980s, this series dramatizes the personal computing boom through the eyes of a visionary, an engineer and a prodigy whose innovations directly confront the corporate ...

title: Sherlock BBC
description: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: The Wire
description: Baltimore drug scene, seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.
comment: Money aint got no owners. Only spenders.

title: Mad Men
description: A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.

title: Jericho
description: A small town in Kansas is literally left in the dark after seeing a mushroom cloud over near-by Denver, Colorado. The townspeople struggle to find answers about the blast and solutions on how to survive.

title: The Increasingly Poor Decisions of Todd Margaret
description: Todd Margaret is an American who takes a job running the London sales team for an energy drink. He has no experience with British culture, knows nothing about sales and has only one employee, Dave.
comment: It's the guy from arrested development!

title: Prison Break
description: Due to a political conspiracy, an innocent man is sent to death row and his only hope is his brother who makes it his mission to deliberately get himself sent to the same prison in order to break the both of them from the inside out.

title: Fargo
description: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota.
comment: Oh man, wouldn't want to cross Malvo

title: Better off Ted
description: In a science-based company, a manager tries to keep control of his scientists while being pressured by his shrewd boss.

title: F is for Family
description: A lower middle class family living in the 1970s.
comment: It would be depressing if it wasnt so funny

title: LOST
description: The survivors of a plane crash are forced to work together in order to survive on a seemingly deserted tropical island.
comment: Did their pilot episode really cost $8M?

title: Black Mirror
description: A television anthology series that shows the dark side of life and technology.

title: Boardwalk Empire
description: An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law, conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.

title: Rick & Morty
description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not so bright grandson.
comment: Yeah all the kids love it

title: House of Cards
description: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

title: Mr. Robot
description: Follows a young computer programmer who suffers from social anxiety disorder and forms connections through hacking. He's recruited by a mysterious anarchist, who calls himself Mr. Robot.

title: Daria
description: A smart & cynical girl goes through teenage life as a proud outsider in a world of mainly idiotic teens and condescending adults.

title: Newsroom
description: A newsroom undergoes some changes in its workings and morals as a new team is brought in, bringing unexpected results for its existing news anchor.
